Text.Name: Zhen_XianTianMuLing
Text.Desc: Activate the body's potential and improve its resilience to physical injuries.

Text.Name: Zhen_ZTLYQLSJ
Text.Desc: Increases Mood, Mental State and Cultivation Speed.

Text.Name: Zhen_FashuhejiEffect
Text.Desc: Cast the next spell by combining the power of everyone in the Formation.

Text.Name: Zhen_RevealEffect
Text.Desc: The auxiliary has now been exposed, attacks on it will deal extra damage. It can be concealed by changing the formation.

Text.Name: Zhen_ChangeEffect
Text.Desc: The pillar has been temporarily changed but the change will be reverted after a while.
